description:
Think that you need a fancy camera to take a good picture? WRONG! Turns out an iPhone is enough to shock people with your photography skills, and the winners from the 2016 iPhone Photography Awards (IPPAWARDS) can prove so.你认为要拍出一张好照片需要一个昂贵的相机吗？错！因为凭借你的摄影技巧，苹果手机拍出的照片就足以惊到大家。2016年苹果手机摄影奖（IPPAWARDS）的优胜者也能证明这一点。

Just recently, the 9th Annual IPPAWARDS ended, and the winners have been announced. From simple landscape photos to photos of adorable animals - all of them are absolutely amazing. Take a look for yourselves below.就在最近，第9届苹果手机年度摄影奖评选结束了，获奖者也已公布。从简单的风景到可爱的动物，所有的照片都非常惊艳。自己看看下面的照片吧。

Erica Wu From San Francisco Ca, United States, 1st Place, Animals动物类，第一名，艾丽卡·吴，来自美国旧金山

Fugen Xiao From Guangdong, China, 1st Place, Travel旅行类，第一名，肖福亘，来自中国广东

Yongmei Wang From Chongqing, China, 2nd Place, Sunset日落，第二名，来自中国重庆

Siyuan Niu From Xinjiang, China, Grand Prize Winner总冠军，牛思源，来自中国新疆

Junbiao Cai From Guangdong, China, 3rd Place, Animals动物类，第三名，蔡君彪，来自中国广东

Jian Wang From Beijing, China, 1st Place, Architecture建筑类，第一名，王建，来自中国北京

Shiyang Han From Beijing, China, 3rd Place, Travel旅行类，第三名，韩世阳，来自中国北京

Xia Zhenkai From Guangdong, China, 1st Place, People人物类，第一名，夏镇凯，来自中国广东

Junfeng Wang From Shanghai, China, 1st Place, Nature自然类，第一名，王军峰，来自中国上海

Lone Bjorn From Zurich, Switzerland, 1st Place, Flowers花朵类，第一名，隆娜·比约恩，来自瑞士苏黎世

Victor Kintanar From Cebu City, Philippines, 1st Place, Trees乔木类，第一名，维克多·肯塔纳，来自菲律宾宿务

Nazaret Sanchez Rodriquez From Tarragona, Spain, 2nd Place, Landscape景观类，第二名，纳萨雷特·桑切斯·罗德里格斯，来自西班牙塔拉戈纳

Jinsong Hu From Kunming, China, 3rd Place, Abstract抽象类，第三名，胡金松，来自中国昆明

Junfeng Wang From Shanghai, China, 1st Place, Nature自然类，第一名，王军峰，来自中国上海

K.k From Changsha, China, 1st Place, Children儿童类，第一名，K.K，来自中国长沙

Wen Qi From Guangdong, China, 1st Place, Still Life静物类，第一名，齐闻，来自中国广东

Yuki Cheung From Hong Kong, 1st Place, Lifestyle生活方式类，第一名，张佑琪，来自香港

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 2016年iphone摄影赛获奖作品：一半来自中国
